game_description: Keystone Titans VR is a VR Autobattler where units will need to be strategically selected and arranged to dominate your opponents. Outsmart the enemy with clever drafting, positioning, and economy management to form the strongest team.
review_1: Auto chess at its best ! This game is a great little time killer, still some bugs to work out but I genuinely have enjoyed hours of play so far and even join the discord in hopes of becoming a beta player ! By far one of the best games IV played so far in any vr ! www.(why)oculus.(why)com/ref(why)errals/li(why)nk/kingc(why)ub86/
